mapper.sql: DDL_GRT_ID, GRTOR_DB_ID, GRTOR_DB_PNM, GRTOR_SCH_ID, GRTOR_SCH_PNM, DDL_OBJ_ID, DDL_OBJ_PNM, DDL_OBJ_LNM, GRTED_DB_ID, GRTED_DB_PNM, GRTED_SCH_ID, GRTED_SCH_PNM, SELECT_YN, INSERT_YN, UPDATE_YN, DELETE_YN, EXECUTE_YN, SYNONYM_YN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, RQST_RESN
mapper.insert:
insert into WAM_DDL_GRT (DDL_GRT_ID, GRTOR_DB_ID, GRTOR_DB_PNM, GRTOR_SCH_ID, GRTOR_SCH_PNM, DDL_OBJ_ID, DDL_OBJ_PNM, DDL_OBJ_LNM, DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD, GRTED_DB_ID, GRTED_DB_PNM, GRTED_SCH_ID, GRTED_SCH_PNM, SELECT_YN, INSERT_YN, UPDATE_YN, DELETE_YN, EXECUTE_YN, SYNONYM_YN, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{ddlGrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executeYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synonymYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

DDL_GRT_ID,
GRTOR_DB_ID,

mapper.update:
update WAM_DDL_GRT
GRTOR_DB_ID = #{grtorDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_DB_PNM = #{grtorDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_SCH_ID = #{grtorSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_SCH_PNM = #{grtorSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_ID = #{ddlObjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_PNM = #{ddlObjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_LNM = #{ddlObjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = #{ddlObjTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_DB_ID = #{grtedDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_DB_PNM = #{grtedDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_SCH_ID = #{grtedSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_SCH_PNM = #{grtedSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT_YN = #{selectYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSERT_YN = #{insertYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_YN = #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_YN = #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTE_YN = #{executeYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNONYM_YN = #{synonymYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_DDL_GRT set GRTOR_DB_ID = #{grtorDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_DB_PNM = #{grtorDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_SCH_ID = #{grtorSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_SCH_PNM = #{grtorSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_ID = #{ddlObjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_PNM = #{ddlObjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_LNM = #{ddlObjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = #{ddlObjTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_DB_ID = #{grtedDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_DB_PNM = #{grtedDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_SCH_ID = #{grtedSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_SCH_PNM = #{grtedSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELECT_YN = #{selectYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_YN = #{insertYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_YN = #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_YN = #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTE_YN = #{executeYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNONYM_YN = #{synonymYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAH_DDL_GRT A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
INNER JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
A.DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_DDL_GRT A LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId}
ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAH_DDL_GRT SET
PRC_TYP_CD = #{prcTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
-- PRC_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD'), PRC_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),
PRC_DT = NULL,
PRC_DBA_ID = #{prcDbaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
PRC_DBA_ID = NULL
WHERE DDL_GRT_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRC_DT IS NULL
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAH_DDL_GRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId} AND A.OBJ_VERS = #{objVers}

SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAH_DDL_GRT A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId} AND A.rqstNo = #{rqstNo}

SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_DDL_GRT A LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId} AND A.OBJ_VERS = #{objVers}
ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC

SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAH_DDL_GRT A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
INNER JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
